title: This is a New Blog Post
My first job as a developer
content: I used to create webpages as a freelancer in the early stages of developer journey. Later, my university friend (was a freelancer working along with his friend who is a full stack developer) found me very interested in frontend development (at that time). He had a look at my mini frontend projects and he asked me if I could join them as a junior front-end developer. And that is how it all started.......

title: I LOVE JavaScript
content:
I have been using JavaScript since the beginning of my coding career!
I used it to build simple websites  
Now I use it to teach others, as well as create simple applications. The possibilities of this language are endless, and the use cases keep increasing every single day!

title: Why learning coding is important?
content:
Nowadays with everything being electronic, everything needs to be programmed! 

From computers, to cars, machines, or anything else it most likely requires programming!

So as a result, demand for coders keeps increasing year by year, due to all these technological advances!
